description: Yuna is one of http://anidb.net/ch38762 [Dr. Akamashi]`s robotic bodyguards, built in the same manner as http://anidb.net/ch21445 [Ana]. Contrary to Ana, however, she is timid and shy. Her use of technology from "the Old World" is more obvious, including an array of precision, long-range weapons such as guns and missiles.
name: Yuna
